snippet: Midfielder Stuart Holden will rejoin the United States national team after an absence of two and a half years for its training camp for three World Cup qualifiers next month.
abstract: Soccer midfielder Stuart Holden will rejoin United States men's national team after absence of two and a half years for its training camp for three World Cup qualifiers.
lead_paragraph: Midfielder Stuart Holden will rejoin the United States national team after an absence of two and a half years for its training camp for three World Cup qualifiers next month.

headline.main: Holden Back With Men’s National Soccer Team
